def_en: Ripples are little waves on the surface of water caused by the wind or by something moving in or on the water.

def_cn: (使)泛起涟漪;(使)泛起细浪
def_en: When the surface of an area of water ripples or when something ripples it, a number of little waves appear on it.

def_cn: (植物等)如波浪起伏;（使）呈波状起伏
def_en: When the wind ripples plants or trees or when they ripple, they move in a wave-like motion.
If something such as a feeling ripples over someone's body, it moves across it or through it.

def_cn: (事情引起的)连锁反应，涟漪作用
def_en: If an event causes ripples, its effects gradually spread, causing several other events to happen one after the other.
